message: Accept my generous offer and we can split the remaining rounds between us!
Let's split it 50/50, no need to get greedy!
You're not getting off that easy! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better offer. Don't expect too much!
You're getting closer to desperation, but I'm still not convinced you're getting the best deal. Meet me in the middle, and we can end this!
I'm not giving in yet. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal!
You're getting close to the end, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give up my edge completely. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me either. This is my final offer!
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
